original: 《三國演義》虛構之人物，為南蠻銀冶洞二十一洞洞主。因不滿孟獲與蜀漢開戰，假意率軍支援孟獲，設計於酒宴上擒下孟獲，送交蜀軍。
text: The fictional character in "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" is the master of the twenty-one cave of Yinye Cave in Nanban. Dissatisfied with the battle between Meng Huo and the Shu Han, he pretended to lead the army to support Meng Huo, designed to capture Meng Huo at a banquet and send it to the Shu army.
